plot: After the fire disaster in the "Ring-Theater" in Vienna in 1881 a court investigates why nearly 400 people had to die in the fire. The script of this movie is based on the original court records.
title: Alles gerettet
plot_es: After the fire disaster in the "Ring-Theater" in Vienna in 1881 a court investigates why nearly 400 people had to die in the fire. The script of this movie is based on the original court records.
